data.event: As of the 2010 census, the city's population was 34,932, and is the principal city of the Bay City Metropolitan Statistical Area, which is included in the Saginaw-Bay City-Saginaw Township North Combined Statistical Area.
In 1831, he built a log cabin on the east bank of the Saginaw river.
Bay City was first established in 1837, and was incorporated as a city in 1865.
